name: Xelia Chronicles: Last Order
description:
Human tend to avoid thing's that not normal in their eyes, so we "Mages" treated unfairly by the society. Focuses their sight on the differences and disregard the fact that we're the same human being. Though we do have a power, that's meant nothing as our number is really limited. All we can do was to accept this cruel fate...
Or so the history say ! at least that has nothing to do with us because we live in a peaceful world right now right ? eh ? no ?.

Xelia Chronicle: Last Order is a JRPG with Linear Motion Battle System like those old times "Tales of" games made with RPG Maker MV and still in development stage. Join Arus, a new teacher at Luma and his students to see how the story unfolds in the world of Xelia.

Feature:

  • Using "Tales of" Linear Motion Battle System (LMBS) as battle system.
  • 8 Playable characters with their own unique set of skills.
  • A lot of classic mini games like fishing, mining, casino and many more.
  • Dungeon exploring with puzzle, secrets etc.
  • The story being told in Visual Novel formats.
